reviews.text:
My experience here was wonderful. I felt catered to and treated like a queen at this restaurant.  Angelica was amazing and tended to our every need! The menu is very robust but the servings and timing of each course was perfect!

I normally ALWAYS have left overs. My sister and I tried both the seafood and meat first course … they were both great!

Book your reservation in advanced! It’s worth it.

We came here on 15th Nov for my Birthday. The food was amazing with a beautiful view of the Coliseum. Mara served us and made sure we had a special evening. We enjoyed it so much we are back for lunch today.
Thank you ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We came to Rome for 3 days and visited the royal twice. Both times were amazing. The most beautiful setting with breathtaking views and the food was delicious!! The staff were so attentive and couldn’t do enough for us, our waitress Bella went above and beyond and made our time extra special. Thank you!! We will be back

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We visited this restaurant on our first day in Rome and loved it so much that we came back on our last day! The food was amazing – the pasta with cheese and the pesto pasta were both delicious. The tropical non-alcoholic cocktail was refreshing and perfect for a warm day. The service was exceptional, and the terrace has a wonderful atmosphere. Thank you very much for an unforgettable experience!

You can’t beat the view and the quality of food at Royal Art Cafe! We were exhausted after touring the Colosseum and wanted to sit down to have a nice meal.
So lucky to find a seat by the window to enjoy the view of the Colosseum!
We didn’t expect much but got blown away by the food when it came out. Not only presentation was beautiful but the food was so tasty.
Shrimp appetizer was wrapped with noodles and it was so crispy but inside was moist. Octopus was warm and accompanied with special pepper, fennel, and orange sauce. It was packed with flavor.

Dessert was WOW moment. We got the tasting sampler mignon and it was so pretty to eat. Pistachio, passion fruit w coco, strawberry vanilla and triple chocolate w cookies. We don’t even like sweets but we enjoyed to the last bite.

Price is very reasonable. Staff are friendly but you need to get their attention if you want more drinks or check.

It was an amazing dining experience and highly recommend this place when you come to Rome.
